column5: I don’t live in America, but I poland. They cut money for treatment but at very low cost I can provide myself private health care.  Also waiting list for best hospital for bpd in Cracow is less than year.
You’ve got really fucked up hospital system in uk.
Male
Im trying to isolate myself even if I know, that it’s not only my fault because I said before to not insult me cuz I can’t handle my emotions and something bad will happens.
It depend on what typu understand by totalny alone. Im alone because nobody understand me, but I have wife, 2 children, friends, but I’m alone in being in this shit.

I’m actually sick and got little hangover + I didn’t sleep for 3 days. 
Yes, we’re social animals wanting interaction.
You can’t never say that you know somebody.
Life it’s something more than portal through eyes. Ye, I understand you a little but you are really drunk xd
I think it’s impossible. That’s dark side of internet - you can talk with somebody, but you won’t ever meet

But as I realized in hospital I feel when I’m talking with someone with bpd. I can’t explain that. Nobody will understand you as well as person with same disorder. Sometimes you don’t even have to say anything.
There’s better life or no life. It doesn’t make sense without being cured.
I think we are better in understanding each other than understand ourselves.
So do I. As far it doesn’t change anything, but I’m not giving up.
We propably not, I live in Poland, so propably it’s too far away, but if you’re asking about connect with yourself it’s possible. First step is medicines and then therapy.
That’s propably right. But as person with bpd I can’t be sure about that
Yep, youre drunk as fuck :D

I wasn’t sleep for 2 days right now. I’m bit scared about mix of 4 medicines. Nothing helps : drugs, alcohol, I’m just surfing internet on phone. 
In morning I take esticilopram 20-25mg and depakine 300mg, on evening another 5mg esticilopram, depakine 500mg, kwetaplex Xr 100mg, chloroprixen(?) and xanax. Didnt help, im up from fryday and im not ever tired. I just drinking beer very slowly (one  for about 3h to be more tired) but actually nothing help. 
Month ago when I took 1mg of Xanax I’ve just fallen asleep in 1h without control, everywhere. Now it doesn’t work at all (I do not take benzos everyday, maximum 3 days and then 3 days break). So wish me luck, cuz for now I’m also out of beer and I’m not able to drive a car.

Yep, as i said feeling understood by other persons who have same disorder is very helpful. It’s not about therapy but you don’t feel so lonely in this shit, it gives motivation. The hardest things about border is find someone who will listen to you and understand you, its possible only when talking to sb with same disorder.
Being understood it’s one of most important things in treatment. I feel same reading posts here.
Today alprozam didn’t do anything. I had to go buy 3 beers, also I ate absurdly amount of food (even for me, cuz normally I eat a lot). So meant now I’ll get some sleep
I know what you feel but I can’t give you a good advice. Nearly same shit here.
So talk with your parents about some break? I’d thought that you are full aged, but some quick holidays it’s always an option. You need to charge your batteries.

Meant it’s not the best advice, but go buy some alcohol, meet with best friends and just drink. After this take a break, try go somewhere, meant it’s time for some holidays? I always on difficult times taking a break on my own - I don’t tell anyone where I go and just do what I want. Sometimes just packing some necessary things and tent and going anywhere to take a break on nature.
I hope you will get better. Border is bitch.
Sometimes therapy can be good, but as it it’s in psychiatrist, meant think of changing your therapists. It doesn’t mean they are bad, you just need to find “the one good for you”.

How for today (very stressful situation) alprozam did it job. Also I didn’t sleep well at night. I just woked up after 3h of sleep and feeling good. Took another pillow to make sure that dreams won’t be so triggering and I’ll sleep well whole night. Also I didn’t even once thought about alcohol.
So meant try DBT instead? It’s propably the best therapy for borderline
But what kind of therapy?
I don’t know what’s worse. Alcohol, drugs or benzodiazepines...
So good luck with therapy. It’s only way to get better. I’m awaiting dbt. For now I’m on medicines (dunno if it work or no) and after first hospitalization after suicide attempt.
Ok, I will write tomorrow how it worked today

I just can’t stop when have some stressful situations and in my stadium it’s just everyday small craps which triggers me. Today I’m gonna give a chance to alprozam, it’s too long when I was drinking everyday.
Of fuck it’s so true
All of these
Ye,that’s just bdp things... you are not able to keep your mind all time busy.
I’ve made my first suicide attempt while my wife was at cinema with friends and I was at home with our children’s. There was nothing to worry about, but I just can’t handle that.
I didn’t read whole post, but just reading tittle made me say “yes”.
I'm starting dbt for first time. I hope it will be helpful.
Border is bitch, you need to fight.

You should go find some professional help. It's good start that you know that you doing wrong and you are aware of your fault. Firstly, take some medicines and then you should start a therapy. If u won't, you'll take first suicide attempt, then another. You need to fight for your future.

So do I. I just realized that I can be in face different person. Than I thought my whole life that am I. 
I'm bit scared by now. I'm starting therapy at friday.
After trying to suicide there's no other way than compare meds and therapy

Of course they are. 
SSRI's, kwetaplex of kwetamine to stabilize your mood, also they could use (as I was in my case) depakine.
Firstly, medicines and then after it will start to work (stabilize) then Therapy.
Yep, so true
So do I
I hate myself cuz of BPD. I don't think I'm good cuz I see sometimes what am I doing to people.
Actually i do not deal. I'm at psychiatrist hospital, going out in 2 days and then I'm going to dialectical-behavioral therapy
I'm on L4 nie because I've had a few attacks of axienity and I have to take 4mg alprozamum in one day
I've been diagnosed by psychiatrist
I've cut myself yesterday. You just can't be sure when shit comes.
I like my job, I do not want to quit. But sometimes my mind is telling me that I have to.
I'm with my wife about 6 years, but probably she's albo sick, nobody normal just can't withstand with me.
I don't feel nothing good for few days. So it's getting worse
It's very sorry to hear that. I don't have rly much knowledge about bdp and I don't want to. Just things you can Google and read on first site.
Till I can't get professional treatment it will be hard - now she have 3 children

I feel like it's war inside me, I think about family and treatment, but I do not enjoy life at all, so what it will help when BPD will be cured? Nothing. And now I don't know what to do - stop this now, or wait in the hope of I'll enjoy life?
So do I.
I'm almost 6 years with my wife. But I think it wasn't easy for her...
If I'd think in this way I would be dead now.
I have two kids. That's only reason I'm alive
Till I know that I'm sick I discovered how to know when I do bad things to my family. It's much worse than staying in ignorance.
I need to wait. For now I have to live, go to work, hurt my wife and family. It's so fucking hard, they know but it's still hard for me. I do not react for medicines.
That's the point.
Paranoic is the worst part.

Few days ago I explained that to my wife. Then I started to cry. I don't want to be such an asshole, but I just can't stop doing this. It's very hard, that's no.1 reason why I don't want to live. I hope hospital treatment will help.
Yep, 100% true

My life in pill. 
I just don't care about my life.
I'm for example cleaning my car. It's really clean inside ( I do not like clean in outside, but inside you can eat from dashboard .

Convulsions, somnolence - it was worst. 
Also swating, delayed reaction etc

I also didn't find any support groups, meaby it's caused by many wariants and cuz each BPD is really personal thing. M25 herez from Poland, pm me if you want. 
My BPD causes self-mutilation, suicide thoughts, so I'm pretty sure that I'm in critical point of my life. 
Also please do not report me to police, they already know and checking me from time to time. I'm waiting for hospital treatment.

Im diagnosed by professional. 
Diagnose was quite good, I felt that I can do something with my life, but then I realized how many bad things I do in my life and how helpless against his own after, this make me feel like useless piece of shit.

There's nothing to love. I'm just a burden for my family. I'm qualified for hospital treatment, there's no possibility to treatment out of hospital, cuz I just don't react to any medicines. I'm very skeptical, they are not sure because I do not react to relanium, ketamine, hydroxyzine, SSRI, after few days I'm reaching maximum dose and that's all. So now I don't have any support in medicines, just taking SSRI and ketamine, but no effect at all. 
I'm hurting myself every few days using nails or knife. 
You don't have to report me to police, they already checking me from time to time, cuz of suicide talk.
DM me anytime you want. I'd also like to talk with somebody with BPD, cuz nobody will understand you like person with same disability.
Worst part of my disability was just get to know that almost all of my memories is piece of shit cuz I've got delusions.

That's one of biggest mistake - when talking to psychiatrist stay open-minded, do not try to autodiagnose, cuz you're not a specialists. I did it once and I'd never do it again. I caused bad diagnosed when tries to diagnose myself, truth was much worse that I could even image, but it gave me proper medicines and diagnose. I've also had a delusions so I can put all my memories to recycle bin. It's hard but necessary.

Part of it belongs also to my borderline. 
I just fucking hate all of these disabilities, why me, why?
I was the one who firmly grounded, now I can't even take care of myself. It's so annoying. I can't even go to work, cuz of insomnia. From hero to the zero in few months, I feel so useless piece of shit. :(
Take one from me 🙃

I'm scared to do anything till I'm sure that I can handle my mind in 100%, so music works for me just in soft cases. But yes, probably I'll make some playlists so I will be easier than looking on YouTube.

If I remember correctly, it's anti-psychotic.
I think that it not work for me at all.
Sertraline caused more bad than good in my case, now I'm on esticil but no progress as far. Also ketamine, but idk if it works or not.
Hm in Poland it's all about price of visiting with any doctor :P so you've got to search somebody else who will be able to reach your mind.

Yes, I did it yesterday so I spend whole evening researching about BPD. 
My wife told that se knew it but still she can't understand few things about it, she don't believe what psychiatrist said, BPD is very difficult and has a lot of spectrums what she can't read in internet, it also could be some combo of few disorders, she just said "stop lying" when I just don't realize that some things are changing in my memory of situations. 
So, long way before us my friend :)

There's still problem with memory, some things usually change in my memories of situations, but it's ok, I just don't talk too much with peoples. I'm waiting for next tests so meaby they'll find what's wrong with it.
Yes, I feel better with it.
There's always some "way" to get in.
That's what I'm scared about, but try to change therapist again and again. One time you'll find this one that will take you to the point.
Msg anytime you want. I'm open with my wife about that, so you can also ask her. She told me about year ago that she think I've God bpd, but I've got diagnosed today, so feel free to ask questions.
Hello, Michał here :). I'm so glad you have gone so far! I'm new in this shit, but we will see how it will go...
Msg me anytime you want - I'll reply as fast I can.

Wow. Such mess here... 
I've lost grandpa few months ago, its very big loss in young age, he was so different than my idiot father (that's only one person in my life who I wish long and painful death).
I'd love that I know you feel, but in this case, I can't. Your post is filled with mess emotions, have you talked any professional help?
I'm ok, just 2h of work :p I've said that it won't work before, nobody check it.
Cuz I just can't stop myself doing it because it looks so ugly, that's part of OCD.
I hope you will get professional help, best wishes!

This day was terrible, I was scared all day, running out from peoples, all day anxiety. When got back got home I ate as fast I can, wash as fast I can, slept for 3.5h, now I took ketrel and waiting for falling asleep. Aw and I ate 7 cookies. It was best part of a day. I hope that I won't wake up every 5 minutes. 
I hope all of you had better day!
So do I. Everything I did make me think of it, that is was bad, I have qualm, and it back again and again and again...

I'm here just for few days but there's awesome community. I'm also studying other ppl cases and there's something I can use to control my mind, because I like to help people's. I read some post, think of it some time and then write hopefully it makes someone's day better.
So do I. In my opinion I screw up almost anything, even if I told that I'll be somewhere in 15 mins and it took 17min cuz of unexpected traffic jam. And it's getting worse and worse...

That's why im not contacting nobody except my mom and wife. People couldn't understand why I won't talk, why sometimes I say some shit or run away. I'm getting home from work about 4pm, wash, eat, sleep for 3hours, wake up for an hour and then go sleep till 6am. I'm worker so I don't need more activities.
